collection.name: Warm-hearted Woodsman
collection.openText: This is a forest full of hearts. No matter how many times he cuts down the hearts, the forest remains dense.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work result was bad, Qliphoth counter has decreased.
An employee whose temperance is over level 3 completed the work, lowering the Qliphoth counter.
When an employee enters and the Qliphoth Counter is at 0, he will die immediately. Then the Abnormality will escape.
